about_the_game: Personalize your gaming experience with the Kappa Cursor! This DLC replaces the standard game cursor with the iconic hand of Kapperor, one of the most beloved characters in the V-Monsters universe. Navigate the game with a unique style and make every click an expression of your personality. This small change makes all the difference in game immersion, making your journey even more fun and engaging.
